oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chickasaw Park with Cossitt Library and Custom House
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Chickasaw Park, Cossitt Library and Custom House, Memphis, Tenn.” Color image with horse-and-carriages in front right of image.

“Mrs. Louis Achyehner -- 631 Linden Ave -- Newport, Ky -- We arrived here today, will -- be here till Sat. at the Park -- Hotel if you should need us -- We are sitting in the park -- on the Banks of the Miss. R. -- We are both fine will start -- for home Sat night by water -- I am tired and will be -- glad to get home. -- Yours -- Mrs. Ward”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chickasaw Park; parks; Cossitt Library; libraries; customs house; federal buildings; riverfront; Mississippi River; downtown;
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Donated by Bev Harber; Collection processed by Angela Price
